name: PB_INVOICE_PMT_HX
description: Stores the list of account transactions and amounts for Premium Billing invoices.

columns.name: PB_INVC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing invoice.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line counter for the payment on the invoice.

columns.name: POST_DATE
columns.description: Date payment was posted on the invoice.

columns.name: PB_ACT_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of premium billing account transaction associated with the payment.
